00001 import wx
00002 import gui.feedbackpanel as feedbackpanel
00003 
00004 class BlockMaker(feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel):
00005     def __init__(self,parent,ID=-1,dimensions=[],description=[],pos=wx.DefaultPosition,size=(220,260)):
00006         feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel.__init__(self,parent,ID,size)
00007 
00008         self.parent = parent
00009         self.SetBackgroundColour(wx.WHITE)
00010         self.dimensions=dimensions
00011         self.description=description
00012         self.SetMinSize(size)
00013         self.Bind(wx.EVT_PAINT, self.OnPaint)
00014 
00015     def OnPaint(self,event):
00016 
00017         sz = self.GetClientSize()
00018         dc = wx.PaintDC(self)
00019         coordinates = []
00020         roomsizes = []
00021         area = []
00022         
00023         xoffset = 25.0
00024         yoffset = 40.0
00025 
00026         for i in xrange(0, len(self.dimensions)):
00027             coordinates.append(float(self.dimensions[i][0])+xoffset)
00028             coordinates.append(float(self.dimensions[i][1])+yoffset)
00029             roomsizes.append(float(self.dimensions[i][2])-float(self.dimensions[i][0]))
00030             roomsizes.append(float(self.dimensions[i][3])-float(self.dimensions[i][1]))
00031 
00032         dc.SetBackground(wx.Brush(self.GetBackgroundColour()))
00033         dc.Clear()
00034         dw, dh = dc.GetSize()
00035 
00036         dc.SetPen(wx.Pen("black",1))
00037         #dc.DrawText(self.labelOne,5,5)
00038         #dc.DrawText(self.labelTwo,30,5)
00039         i = 0
00040 
00041         for j in xrange(0, len(self.dimensions)):
00042             if self.description[j] == 'S':
00043                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('white'))
00044             elif self.description[j] == 'RST' or self.description[j] == 'BTH':
00045                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('firebrick'))        # RST - Restroom, BTH - Bathroom : FIREBRICK
00046             elif self.description[j] == 'KTH' or self.description[j] == 'DIN':
00047                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('green'))            # KTH - Kitchen, DIN - Dining Room : GREEN
00048             elif self.description[j] == 'LIV' or self.description[j] == 'LBK' or self.description[j] == 'LKT':
00049                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('red'))              # LIV - Living Room, LBK - Living/Bed/Kitchen Combo, LKT - Living/Kitchen Combo : RED
00050             elif self.description[j] == 'MBR' or self.description[j] == 'GBR' or self.description[j] == 'BED': 
00051                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('yellow'))           # BED - Bed Room : YELLOW
00052             else:
00053                 dc.SetBrush(wx.Brush('dim gray'))         # Other rooms
00054 
00055             dc.DrawRectangle(coordinates[i], coordinates[i+1], roomsizes[i], roomsizes[i+1])
00056             i += 2
